description:
Cress is a gym leader of Sanyo City Gym where he shares the responsibility with Chili and Cilan. He is also a Pokémon Sommelier who, with his abundance of knowledge and experience, determines the compatibility of Trainers and Pokémon and gives them advice on how to befriend each other.
Cress`s Panpour is his main Pokémon, a water type, who was sent out to battle against Pikachu when Ash challenged all three of the Sanyo City Gym Leaders. Cress was quickly able to counter Ash`s tactic of using an electric type Pokémon as his Hiyappu was able to defeat Pikachu.
name: Corn
